overview: Johannes Passion BMV 245, 1725 Version von Johann Sebastian Bach performed and filmed at King's College Kapelle, Camebridge, UK by:  The Choir of King's College, Cambridge  The Brandenburg Consort  John Mark Ainsley (Evangelist)  Stephen Richardson (Christus)  Catherine Bott (Soprano)  Michael Chance (Alto)  Paul Agnew (Tenor)  Stephen Varcoe (Bass/Pilatus)
title: Johann Sebastian Bach - Johannes Passion
